page.title: 17THE ECUMENICAL CHURCH.
page.content: The Church in Knightsridge is part of the Ecumenical Parish in the new town of Livingston. The members of four Protestant faiths meet and worship together. These are the Church of Scotland, the Congregational Union, the Methodists and the Episcopal Church in Scotland. The Church in Knightsridge, as yet, does not have a building of its own. They meet every Sunday in the main hall of Knightsridge Primary school to worship together. The Sunday School also use rooms in the school. The minister is also the minister to the congregation at Carmondean, a neighbouring area.
